q: to have plenty of laughs at Piers Morgan and Simon Cowell 's expense but now they've been replaced with Michael McIntyre and David Hasselhoff . Ant McPartlin admitted BGT had changed without those two big egos to prick. He said: It has changed the mood of the show but, you know, it might be for the better.`` Hoff does a great job but isn't Simon Cowell or Piers Morgan . You miss Simon Cowell because he is the best judge. He has that ability to say what you at home are thinking. Declan Donnelly added:`` For me, it's just great to be able to introduce the guy from Knight Rider every day... to a backing track of the Knight Rider theme tune.''

As well as the cast of a traditional pantomime, the show also includes young people acting as the judges of Britain's Got Talent, Simon Cowell , Amanda Holden and Piers Morgan . Mrs Twine said: We were all set to do the show, but the heavy snow put a stop to it.`` Even if we could have opened the school we wouldn't have had an audience.`` But, luckily the panto doesn't have a Christmas theme, so it's fine to put on now. If anything happens, I will announce it. He said firefighters had been deployed close to the museum to intervene as needed. His blog also featured pictures of heavily armed troops stationed at his office and behind the museum's high railings.

was spotted by Tory grandees; in his own profession, so too was Andy Coulson . Possibly apocryphally, Sun editor Kelvin MacKenzie once ordered`` all those people on Bizarre'' should be sacked, before ringing back to say Hang on. You haven't sacked a bloke called Andy Coulson , have you? Get him back. Get him back because Andy Coulson could persuade, and did, Stephen Gately of Boyzone to come out in the Sun as gay. n't panic. They made veteran plays. The Memphis Grizzlies were hurt by their youth. Allen Iverson had 32 points and 12 assists Wednesday night, and the Nuggets used a late run to beat the Grizzlies 106-102. This was a Yao Ming win for us at somebody else's home, Allen Iverson said.`` Down seven points with 3 minutes to go. It was a gut check for us. Mitt Romney got a David Letterman plug for his book,`` No Apology,'' and then stood, sans-tie, to announce a casual, comically self-deprecating lineup of`` Things You Don't Know About Mitt Romney .'' 10. Mitt Romney is short for Mitt-thew. 9. I can't begin my day until I've read the Washington Post and Kim Kardashian 's Tweets. 8. I'm the guy in the photo that comes with your picture frame. 7.
